p: GC: Three replicates of each sample were analyzed by using a Hewlett-Packard Model 5890A GC, equipped with a flame ionization detector and fitted with a 60 m × 0.25 mm (I.D.), thickness 0.25 μm ZB-5 fused silica capillary column (Phenomenex, Torrance CA, USA). Injection port and detector temperatures were maintained at 280 °C.
